FuncDef:
The dhcp reply-packet option82 location strict command configures the NE40E to encapsulate Option 82 behind all options in the DHCP Offer and ACK messages replied to DHCP clients.
The undo dhcp reply-packet option82 location strict command restores the default configuration.
By default, the device encapsulates the options delivered by the RADIUS server behind all options in the DHCP Offer and ACK messages replied to DHCP clients.
CLIs: undo dhcp reply-packet option82 location strict
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
By default, the device encapsulates the options delivered by the RADIUS server behind all options in the DHCP Offer and ACK messages replied to DHCP clients. To allow the device to communicate with devices that require Option 82 to be encapsulated behind all options, run the dhcp reply-packet option82 location strict command.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
